```{r}
#|label: setup
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(ggformula)
```

```{r}
penguins %>% glimpse()
```

##Qual charts
```{r}
penguins %>% gf_bar(~ species)
penguins %>% gf_bar(~ species, fill= ~species, alpha=0.3)
```

```{r}
penguins %>% gf_bar(~ species, fill=~ island, colour= "black", alpha= 0.3)
```

##quant variables
```{r}
penguins %>% gf_density(~ body_mass)
penguins %>% gf_density(~ body_mass, fill= ~ species )
```

```{r}
penguins %>% gf_density(~ body_mass) %>% gf_facet_wrap(~ island)
```

```{r}
penguins %>% gf_density_ridges(species ~ body_mass, fill= ~ species, alpha= 0.3)
```
